quotes.data: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.data: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.data: I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.data: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.data: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.data: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.author: Bernard M. Baruch

quotes.data: So many books, so little time.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.data: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.data: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.data: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.data: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.data: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.data: If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.data: No one can make you feel inferior without your consent.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.data: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.data: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.data: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.data: Without music, life would be a mistake.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.data: Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.data: We accept the love we think we deserve.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.data: Imitation is suicide.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.data: Do your own thing on your own terms and get what you came here for.
quotes.author: Oliver James

quotes.data: People are like bicycles. They can keep their balance only as long as they keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.data: Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited, whereas imagination embraces the entire world, stimulating progress, giving birth to evolution.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.data: Any man who reads too much and uses his own brain too little falls into lazy habits of thinking.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.data: If there is no price to be paid, it is also not of value.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.data: Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.data: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or objects.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.data: The high destiny of the individual is to serve rather than to rule.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.data: The only source of knowledge is experience.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.data: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.data: Anyone who has ever made anything of importance was disciplined.
quotes.author: Andrew Hendrixson

quotes.data: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.data: Optimism is the one quality more associated with success and happiness than any other.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.data: Always keep your eyes open. Keep watching. Because whatever you see can inspire you.
quotes.author: Grace Coddington

quotes.data: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.data: I destroy my enemies when I make them my friends.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.data: Don’t live the same year 75 times and call it a life.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.data: You cannot save people, you can just love them.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.data: It wasn’t raining when Noah built the ark.
quotes.author: Howard Ruff

quotes.data: There is no way to happiness. Happiness is the way.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.data: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.data: You will succeed because most people are lazy.
quotes.author: Shahir Zag

quotes.data: Genius is 1% inspiration, 99% perspiration.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.data: Do it with passion, or not at all.
quotes.author: Rosa Nouchette Carey

quotes.data: The grass is greener where you water it.
quotes.author: Neil Barringham

quotes.data: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.data: Sometimes you win, sometimes you learn.
quotes.author: John Maxwell

quotes.data: Never apologize for having high standards. People who really want to be in your life will rise up to meet them.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.data: I never dream of success. I worked for it.
quotes.author: Estee Lauder

quotes.data: Software is like sex: it's better when it's free.
quotes.author: Linus Torvalds
